name: Mass Suggestion
description: Enemy units within 2 tiles have a 25% chance to skip their turn. Gain +1 Science for each affected unit.

name: Mind Control
description: 50% chance to convert adjacent enemy units with less than 50% health to your side.

name: Suggestion
description: Reduces adjacent enemy unit combat strength by 10%.

name: Hypnotic Aura
description: Enemy units within 3 tiles of the city suffer a -10% combat penalty.
